item.description:
Shamanic Dreaming with Susan Morgan
Friday, April 6    

6-7 PM Book Signing (walk in)
7-9 pm Shamanic Dream Class, $35
Register: susan@mysticdreamcenter.com or 860-536-3050
Join us for both!
Learn the ancient art of Dream Reading and harvest the guidance and healing your dreams bring you nightly. Dreams nudge us toward our larger purpose. Learn how to claim your own dream power. Thru heartbeat drumming we go into a dream to gain knowledge. You'll learn a quick technique for understanding your dreams! Bring a notebook or journal.


Susan learned how to understand her dreams motivated by a lifetime of very strong dreaming. She had so many dreams with a Native American theme, she was compelled to do extensive genealogical research. This led to her knowledge of her Native ancestry; Abenaki and Huron. Susan has found healing in her dreams and enthusiastically shares this knowledge. Susan is also an intuitive medium, visual artist and writer, and teaches this workshop thoughtout New England. We welcome her first time to A HIgher Balance.
item.name: Shamanic Dreaming
